sections.title: Verse 1
content: To You, O Lord, I lift up my soul,
In You O my God, I place all my trust.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Look down on me, have mercy, O Lord;
Forgive me my sins, behold all my grief.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: My heart and soul shall yearn for your face,
Be gracious to me and answer my plea.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Do not withhold Your goodness from me,
O Lord, may your love be deep in my soul.

sections.title: Verse 5
content: To You I pray, have pity on me;
My God, I have sinned against Your great love.

sections.title: Verse 6
content: Mercy I cry, O Lord, wash me clean;
And whiter than snow my spirit shall be.

sections.title: Verse 7
content: Give me again the joy of Your help,
Now open my lips, your praise I will sing.

sections.title: Verse 8
content: Happy is he, forgiven by God;
His sins blotted out, his guilt is no more.

sections.title: Verse 9
content: You are my joy, my refuge and strength;
Let all upright hearts give praise to the Lord.

sections.title: Verse 10
content: My soul will sing; my heart will rejoice;
The blessings of God will fill all my days.

sections.title: Chorus
content: Yes, I shall arise, and return to my father,
Yes, I shall arise, and return to my father.
